commit message: 'dumpAll' Gradle task improved to use versionName from 'app' module
'dumpAll' Gradle task improved to use versionName from 'app' module
#288 Translations of a User Guide updated. Section 3 needs re-translation. Section 4 is new.
#288 Fixed preference title
#288 Translations updated
#291 Unsent messages introduced. Step 1.
Attachments may refer to Uri now (i.e. not to URL only)
Unsent messages with attachments are created
Cleaned DownloadData class
Draft and Unsent messages are stored in a database, are visible in a Timeline (indistinguishable from other messages yet)
testSharingMediaToThisApp really works now. Images of drafts are stored in a database. Drafts and unsent messages have (draft) and (unsent) in a timeline.
Workaround AIDE bug described at https://plus.google.com/103352957740632748919/posts/bPjqRtziM2i
Edit draft implemented
#291 All tests passed

#291 1. 'Clear and hide' action replaced with two: 'Save draft' and 'Discard', both of which hide Message editor.
2. Drafts and Outbox timelines added. This is just like in an emailing application.
#291 Message status shown in Conversation view also: Draft and unsent messages are shown in a Conversation view.
#290 Text of a message we are replying to is shown in a Message Editor.
#290 In a Message Editor: Username is shown on a separate line, just like in a timeline
#290 The second attachment replaces the first one. Supposedly fixed draft text lost on some screen updates.
#290 Attached image thumbnail and information on image size (in pixels and in kilobytes) added to the Message Editor
#290 Added design time attributed to a Message Editor layout. See http://tools.android.com/tips/layout-designtime-attributes
#290 'Send' button moved to the Action bar
#290 'Send' button moved to the Action bar
#290 'Resend' context menu item added for Unsent messages
Texts unified. andstatus.org site updated.
#290 Fixed editing of unsent messages
Translations updated
